vernac_cmds: Definition copy_trans (c : Config) (s1 s2 : Site) := mkconfig (S (time c)) (dt c) (Inc_send_table (st c) s1) (rt c) (Post_message copy (bm c) s1 s2).
Lemma copy_trans_le_dt_time : forall s0 : Site, dt c0 s0 <= time c0 -> dt (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s0 <= time (copy_trans c0 s1 s2).
Lemma copy_trans_diff_site : forall s3 s4 : Site, (In_queue Message copy (bm c0 s3 s4) -> s3 <> s4) -> In_queue Message copy (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s3 s4) -> s3 <> s4.
simpl in |- *; intros; case (eq_queue_dec s1 s3 s2 s4); intro.
decompose [and] a; rewrite <- H1; rewrite <- H2; trivial.
Lemma copy_trans_st : forall s0 : Site, st (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s0 = (if eq_site_dec s0 s1 then (st c0 s0 + 1)%Z else st c0 s0).
intro; simpl in |- *; case (eq_site_dec s0 s1); intro.
Lemma copy_trans_in_queue : forall s0 s3 s4 : Site, In_queue Message (inc_dec s0) (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s3 s4) -> In_queue Message (inc_dec s0) (bm c0 s3 s4).
intros; apply in_post with (m' := copy) (s1 := s1) (s2 := s2).
Lemma copy_trans_st_rt : forall s0 : Site, s0 <> owner -> access s1 (rt c0) -> ((st c0 s0 > 0)%Z -> rt c0 s0 = true) -> (st (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s0 > 0)%Z -> rt (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s0 = true.
intro; rewrite copy_trans_st; simpl in |- *; case (eq_site_dec s0 s1); intro.
unfold access in |- *; rewrite <- e; intros; elim H0; intro.

Lemma copy_trans_ctrl_copy : forall s' : Site, ctrl_copy s0 s' (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2)) = (if eq_site_dec s0 s1 then if eq_site_dec s' s2 then (ctrl_copy s0 s' (bm c0) + 1)%Z else ctrl_copy s0 s' (bm c0) else ctrl_copy s0 s' (bm c0)).
intros; unfold ctrl_copy in |- *; simpl in |- *.
rewrite e; rewrite e0; apply post_card_mess.
Lemma copy_trans_ctrl_dec : forall s' : Site, ctrl_dec s0 s' (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2)) = ctrl_dec s0 s' (bm c0).
intros; unfold ctrl_dec in |- *; simpl in |- *.
Lemma copy_trans_ctrl_inc : forall s' : Site, ctrl_inc s0 s' (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2)) = ctrl_inc s0 s' (bm c0).
intros; unfold ctrl_inc in |- *; simpl in |- *.
Remark copy_trans_sigma_copy : sigma_ctrl_copy s0 (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2)) = (if eq_site_dec s0 s1 then (sigma_ctrl_copy s0 (bm c0) + 1)%Z else sigma_ctrl_copy s0 (bm c0)).
rewrite e; rewrite case_eq; apply case_eq.
rewrite e; rewrite case_eq; apply case_ineq; trivial.
Remark copy_trans_sigma_dec : sigma_ctrl_dec s0 (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2)) = sigma_ctrl_dec s0 (bm c0).
Remark copy_trans_sigma_inc : sigma_ctrl_inc s0 (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2)) = sigma_ctrl_inc s0 (bm c0).
Lemma copy_trans_sigma_ctrl : sigma_ctrl s0 (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2)) = (if eq_site_dec s0 s1 then (sigma_ctrl s0 (bm c0) + 1)%Z else sigma_ctrl s0 (bm c0)).
Remark copy_trans_xi : forall s0 : Site, xi (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s0 = (if eq_site_dec owner s1 then if eq_site_dec s0 s2 then (xi c0 s0 + 1)%Z else xi c0 s0 else xi c0 s0).
simpl in |- *; case (eq_site_dec owner s1); intro.
Remark copy_trans_yi : forall s0 : Site, yi (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s0 = yi c0 s0.
intro; unfold yi in |- *; apply sigma_simpl.
Lemma copy_trans_sigma_xi : sigma_xi (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) = (if eq_site_dec owner s1 then (sigma_xi c0 + 1)%Z else sigma_xi c0).
rewrite e; rewrite case_eq; apply case_eq.
rewrite e; rewrite case_eq; apply case_ineq; trivial.
Lemma copy_trans_sigma_yi : sigma_yi (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) = sigma_yi c0.
unfold sigma_yi in |- *; apply sigma_simpl; intros; apply copy_trans_yi.
Lemma copy_trans_D : D_queue (bm c0 s0 owner) -> D_queue (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s0 owner).
intros; simpl in |- *; apply D_post_elsewhere; auto.
Lemma copy_trans_alt : alternate (bm c0 s0 owner) -> alternate (bm (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s0 owner).
intros; simpl in |- *; apply alt_post_elsewhere; auto.
Remark copy_trans_parent : forall s3 s4 : Site, parent (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s4 s3 -> parent c0 s4 s3.
apply copy_trans_in_queue with (s1 := s1) (s2 := s2); trivial.
Lemma copy_trans_parent_cr : forall s3 s4 : Site, (parent c0 s3 s4 -> dt c0 s3 < dt c0 s4) -> parent (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s3 s4 -> dt (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s3 < dt (copy_trans c0 s1 s2) s4.

command: simpl in |- *; intros; case (eq_queue_dec s1 s3 s2 s4); intro.
decompose [and] a; rewrite <- H1; rewrite <- H2; trivial.
intro; simpl in |- *; case (eq_site_dec s0 s1); intro.
intros; apply in_post with (m' := copy) (s1 := s1) (s2 := s2).
intro; rewrite copy_trans_st; simpl in |- *; case (eq_site_dec s0 s1); intro.
unfold access in |- *; rewrite <- e; intros; elim H0; intro.
intros; unfold ctrl_copy in |- *; simpl in |- *.
rewrite e; rewrite e0; apply post_card_mess.
intros; unfold ctrl_dec in |- *; simpl in |- *.
intros; unfold ctrl_inc in |- *; simpl in |- *.
rewrite e; rewrite case_eq; apply case_eq.
rewrite e; rewrite case_eq; apply case_ineq; trivial.
simpl in |- *; case (eq_site_dec owner s1); intro.
intro; unfold yi in |- *; apply sigma_simpl.
rewrite e; rewrite case_eq; apply case_eq.
rewrite e; rewrite case_eq; apply case_ineq; trivial.
unfold sigma_yi in |- *; apply sigma_simpl; intros; apply copy_trans_yi.
intros; simpl in |- *; apply D_post_elsewhere; auto.
intros; simpl in |- *; apply alt_post_elsewhere; auto.
apply copy_trans_in_queue with (s1 := s1) (s2 := s2); trivial.
